message: React to message from Jukka-Pekka Pääkkönen
Reply to message from Jukka-Pekka Pääkkönen
Hey there! Bali's treating me well today with this perfect beach weather 😊 How's your week going?
Greetings to you here in Finland too, it's hot, the sun is shining and the temperature is +30 degrees 🤗
Wow +30 sounds amazing! We're at that perfect beach temp here too 😊 What's your favorite way to cool down when it gets that hot?
Hello, the weather is already too hot for a northerner, even swimming doesn't bring relief, you need to stay in the shade and drink a lot 😂😂🌞🧊🥤
That Finnish heat sounds intense! I'd probably be hiding in the shade with iced matcha too 🥤 Do you have any favorite summer drinks there?
Hello Jukka, hows your weekend been?
Hello 🌻 The weekend went well even though the weather was too hot (the air conditioner broke)😂😰🔥🧊
hahah damn, thats the worst, when the ac gives up on a boling hot day! How did u cool down?
Lots of drinks and cold showers, luckily it was a cool 10 degrees at night (+28 during the day)
